[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 0%|rgba(9,19,30,0.85) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/doctor_header-bg.jpg” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”background-position: 50% 32%;” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Doctors

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”838px” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Customized Guidance for Doctors 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_font_size=”32px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You can rely on us to provide customized guidance to manage and protect the wealth you’ve worked so hard for.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As doctors one thing is certain: you’ve worked hard. You do your best to make the right decisions at the right times and the result? You’ve earned the right to work even harder. The backbone of our community and the reason parents can sleep well at night — because they know you’re there for them. We all know you’re there for us.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F7F7F7″ custom_padding=”30px|3%|30px|3%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”93345947-f191-46db-8752-0103e26d6920″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We’ll work with you and your team of professionals to create, implement and manage a plan focused on the needs of your practice as well as your personal goals and dreams.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjM4OCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Work With Us” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You’ve dedicated your lives to keeping yourselves fully informed and up to date on the newest medical advancements and for all this, you deserve each and every dime you earn. With your demanding schedules, something has to give – and unfortunately, as we see time and time again, it’s your own financials that pay the price.

You’re likely giving away far too much money in taxes and paying unreasonable portfolio management fees which only works against the overall purpose of the advisor-client relationship. Whether you’re incorporated or not, ready to retire or just starting to build your practice, our tailored financial plans for doctors will do one of two things: confirm that you are doing everything right or bring to light those strategies which are missing. We will redesign your entire financial structure for you and give it to you in black and white. Tax efficiency and wealth management at its pinnacle. We get it — you put your patients first. At Rosen Group Private Wealth Management, we put clients like you first.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_id=”advice” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”90px||||false|false” Winding Down Your Corporation

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”left” custom_padding=”1px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#advice” button_text=”Read More” button_alignment=”left” module_class=”simple-text-button divioverlay-852″ _builder_version=”4.16″ of doctors are over 65 years old

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”12px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”300px” module_alignment=”center” link_option_url=”http://www.cbc.ca/news/health/more-doctors-keep-working-after-retirement-age-1.1126254″ link_option_url_new_window=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#86754E” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_number_counter number=”90″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” number_font=”|800|||||||” number_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_number_counter][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”300px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

or more of Canadian physicians are incorporated

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”12px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Source: The Globe and Mail, 2014

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_number_counter number=”12″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” number_font=”|800|||||||” number_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_number_counter][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”220px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

of doctors are over 65 years old

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”12px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”300px” module_alignment=”center” link_option_url=”http://www.cbc.ca/news/health/more-doctors-keep-working-after-retirement-age-1.1126254″ link_option_url_new_window=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Source: CBC – ‘More Doctors Keep Working After Retirement Age’ April 2011

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” disabled=”on” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|5%|||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to our newsletter!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Protect your financial health with expert insights and strategies tailored to doctors. Subscribe now to stay informed and ensure your hard work pays off!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_signup mailchimp_list=”add_new_account” name_field=”on” success_message=”Thank you, you have been subscribed.” use_spam_service=”on” recaptcha_list=”Rosen Group-0″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” form_field_background_color=”#F7F7F7″ use_background_color=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_signup][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cta-footer-background-paralax_2.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” global_module=”868″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-center” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_typing_effect before_typing_effect=”Invest in ” typing_effect=”yourself.|your future.” typing_speed=”50ms” typing_backdelay=”3000ms” typing_cursor=”| ” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”48px” header_font_size_phone=”36px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_typing_effect][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: DoctorsCustomized Guidance for Doctors You can rely on us to provide customized guidance to manage and protect the wealth you’ve worked so hard for.As doctors one thing is certain: you’ve worked hard. You do your best to make the right decisions at the right times and the result? You’ve earned the right to work even harder. The backbone of our community and the reason parents can sleep well at night — because they know you’re there for them. We all know you’re there for us.We’ll work with you and your team of professionals to create, implement and manage a plan focused on the needs of your practice as well as your personal goals and dreams.You’ve dedicated your lives to keeping yourselves fully informed and up to date on the newest medical advancements and for all this, you deserve each and every dime you earn. With your demanding schedules, something has to give – and unfortunately, as we see time and time again, it’s your own financials that pay the price. You’re likely giving away far too much money in taxes and paying unreasonable portfolio management fees which only works against the overall purpose of the advisor-client relationship. Whether you’re incorporated or […]
